sentence: Mrs. TRAHAN. Mr. Speaker, I was not present for votes today. Had I  been present, I would have voted NAY on Roll Call No. 277, H.R. 3062;  NAY on Roll Call No. 278, H.R. 3015; and NAY on Roll Call No. 279, H.R.  1047.
